execution_quality: The agent made good diagnostic progress by reading relevant files and testing current behavior, but the solution had issues - it encountered 3 edit errors suggesting the fixes weren't well-thought-out. The agent was responsive to user feedback but the technical implementation needed refinement.
work_category: Debugging and problem-solving around docking state detection on Linux. The agent investigated the current implementation, identified issues with acpid event handling, and proposed code modifications to improve dock detection.
summary: The agent engaged seriously with the user's dock detection problem and made diagnostic steps, but the proposed solution had implementation issues (3 edit errors) that weren't fully resolved. When the user requested a script instead, this indicated the initial approach may not have fully addressed their needs. The agent demonstrated focused effort but misaligned on what the user actually wanted (executable tooling rather than code modifications).
follow_up_pattern: User pivoted from evaluating the proposed solution to requesting a script instead, suggesting they wanted a different form of the solution (executable script) rather than continuing to debug the previous approach.
